title: Resetting a forgotten password
summary: Guide employees through resetting credentials when SSO is not enforced.
chunk: If you forgot your password, go to ramp.com/reset, enter your work email, and follow the link we send. When your account is SSO-only, the form will alert you and point you back to the provider (Google, Microsoft Entra, Okta, OneLogin).

title: Updating MFA when devices change
summary: Clarify choices when employees lose access to their MFA methods.
chunk: If the phone number tied to multi-factor is inactive, contact your Ramp admin to reset MFA. They can remove the old number under Company Settings → Members. For authenticator apps, they can disable MFA and prompt you to set it back up on your next sign-in.

title: Link a bank account before requesting reimbursement
summary: Employees must add direct deposit info when the company pays reimbursements on Ramp.
chunk: If your finance team pays reimbursements on Ramp, use the Create reimbursement button and follow the prompt to connect your bank account. Electronic payouts require account verification before the request can be submitted.

title: Eligibility for Faster Payments
summary: Only Ramp Plus customers processing U.S. ACH payments can opt into Faster Payments.
chunk: Faster Payments is a Ramp Plus benefit. To enable it, open Bill Pay → Settings → Payment timing and toggle Faster Payments. The vendor must accept ACH and there is a 1% fee that appears on the bill summary.
